content: in this legal case the tallinn district court made a final decision after a 2year and 8month process the details of the case are not mentioned but the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs the court decision annuls a previous decision made by the harju county court and orders the eviction of one party referred to as x from a property the decision also divides the financial obligations and assets between the parties x is ordered to sell the property at a public auction to fulfill a loan obligation with the remaining money divided equally x is also ordered to compensate the other party for certain financial claims the court addresses the use of the property and sets the amount of compensation to be paid the costs of the proceedings are to be borne by both parties the text also explains the background of the case including the purchase of the property and the divorce of the parties the objections and appeals of both parties are mentioned as well as the reasoning of the court in making its decision the district court partially satisfies the appeals of both parties and makes changes to the previous decision the court also addresses the division of assets and financial claims the text concludes by mentioning that further arguments and claims can be made at the appeal stage
